QuestData.Title: Restocking the Buffet
QuestData.Description:
Imagine for a moment, $p. You wake up in de Goldtusk Inn after a long day of drinking scorpid blood, slaughtering Sandfury, and sharing jokes with your best friend Zulsan.
Ya not fully awake yet, and not feeling ya best. What do you need most at dat exact moment?
An all-you-can-eat breakfast buffet, of course!
I'm working on it, but I need some fruit to balance out my menu. Luckily, I've seen some in de oasis outside.
Bring me some, and I'll give you lifetime access to de buffet.
